topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack(R) Carrier Grade (Beta): Enabling and Disabling a Router

body.p: You can enable or disable routers, as needed.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Routers link.
The routers for the selected project appear.
For the router you want to delete, click Edit Router in the Actions menu.
From the Admin State list, select UP to enable the router.
Launch the HP Helion OpenStack(R) Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Routers link.
The routers for the selected project appear.
For the router you want to delete, click Edit Router in the Actions menu.
From the Admin State list, select DOWM to disable the router.
